animeDescription: Commercials by Dunlop Tyres Japan for their Winter Maxx tire line.  Episode 1 (Kimi e to Tsuzuku Michi) (The Road That Goes on to You): The anime short's story is set in a certain snowy land and centers on the intermingling feelings of three groups of men and women: a couple, a parent and child, and coworkers.  Episode 2 (Hoshifuru Oka no Yakusoku) (Promise of the Starry Hill): College student Yui was suddenly invited by her mother to visit an observatory on her 20th birthday. Yui has to travel along snow-covered roads to reach the observatory. The visit makes Yui remember going to the same observatory with her late father on every birthday when she was a small child.  Episode 3 (Kioku ni Mau Konayuki) (The Snow that Dances in Memories): Tells a tragic teen love story about two childhood friends who fall in love only to part ways when the girl decides to study abroad in France.
animeVoices: ['Takahashi, Rie', 'Yuuki, Aoi', 'Yonai, Yuki', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Saitou, Chiwa', 'Okamoto, Nobuhiko', 'Nojima, Kenji', 'Asano, Masumi', 'Tsuda, Minami']
